animeDescription: Researcher Mutsugoro takes his family to a remote and uninhabited island near Hokkaido, to study the local population of wild bears. Nearby poachers make his life difficult, and he "inherits" an orphaned bear cub, whom the family call Donbe and raise as one of their own.
animeStaff: [['Takada Hiroshi', ['Theme Song Arrangement', 'Music']], ['Ookuma Toshihiro', ['Art Director']], ['Fukuda Gen', ['Animation Director', 'Character Design']], ['Tsunoda Toshitaka', ['Animation Director']]]
